clinical_history: Follow-up ultrasound for known liver lesion.
technique: Longitudinal, transverse, and oblique views obtained.
findings: Breast tissue shows hypoechoic lesion measuring 22.97 mm.
Gallbladder shows well-defined, no stones or wall thickening.
Uterus appears coarse; endometrial thickness measures 19.15 mm.
Thyroid gland shows hypoechoic echotexture; no suspicious nodules.
Major vessels show homogeneous waveform on Doppler.
